entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Point Lepreau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:40 a.m. ADT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 7.5Â°C

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 10.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High 10. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear near midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming north 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Tuesday 4 April 2023
